text: Lasianthus grandifolius is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Tanzania. ==Sources== * Lovett, J. & Clarke, G.P. 1998. Lasianthus grandifolius. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. title: Lasianthus grandifolius
